job.title: Vice President of Sales Strategy, Planning & Operations for Americas (US, Canada and Latin America) - Opportunity for Working Remotely
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Reporting to the AMER Sales SVP and GM and dotted line to the VP of WW Sales Strategy, Planning & Effectiveness, the AMER Sales Strategy, Planning & Operations Leader’s mission is to drive a predictable Americas business in partnership with sales leadership. This is accomplished through building the Americas plan and strategic initiatives, delivering rigor and excellence in sales processes, providing proactive insights that enable better decision-making, and exhibiting leadership through actions and measurable outcomes.
The role also participates in VMware’s overall transformation to SaaS, implementing the required Go-To-Market changes, and collaborating with the WW Sales Strategy, Planning & Effectiveness team to enable sustainable and scalable sales processes and initiatives.
